EN.ERR_MISSING_CREDENTIALS: A username and password must be provided.
EN.ERR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid credentials provided. Please try again.
EN.ERR_INVALID_MINUTES: Minutes must be between 0 and 5256000. Please try again.
EN.ERR_INVALID_AUTHKEY: Authentication information invalid. Please login again.
EN.ERR_INVALID_USER: The specified user is invalid or does not exist.
EN.ERR_NOT_AUTHORIZED: You do not have the required permissions to access this operation.
EN.ERR_MISFORMED_EMAIL: Email must be a valid email of 100 characters or less.
EN.ERR_MISFORMED_USERNAME: Username must be an alphanumeric string with no space of 3 to 100 characters.
EN.ERR_MISFORMED_GROUPNAME: Groupname must be an alphanumeric string of 3 to 100 characters.
EN.ERR_USER_CREATION: User creation failed. Make sure the username does not already exist.
EN.ERR_GROUP_CREATION: Group creation failed. Make sure the groupname does not already exist.
